title: Unveiling the Impact of
abstract: Periodontitis is a chronic inflammatory condition with infectious origin that affects the tissues supporting the teeth. Increasing epidemiological evidence suggests that periodontitis is a risk factor for ischemic stroke with associated adverse outcomes. However, the underlying mechanism of this association remains incompletely elucidated. We used a C57BL/6J mice model of ischemic stroke induced by transitory occlusion of the middle cerebral artery in the presence or absence of ligature-induced periodontitis using  Mice with  Our findings demonstrate that
